thread.title: Lamar Odom awakens from coma, breathing on his own: reports - Chicago Tribune
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom awakens from coma, breathing on his own: reports - Chicago Tribune

author: Tribune wire reports
title: Lamar Odom awakens from coma, breathing on his own: reports - Chicago Tribune
text:
Lamar Odom has reportedly awoken form his coma and is now breathing on his own, E! News reports.
The former NBA player and reality star remains in critical condition, but is said to finally be communicating. He was hospitalized and put on life support on Tuesday following a drug overdose at a brothel in Nevada, 90 minutes northwest of Las Vegas.
"Hey, baby," Odom allegedly told estranged wife Khloé Kardashian on Friday before going back to sleep, E! News reports.
A spokeswoman for Odom's aunt says the NBA star woke up and spoke three days after being found unconscious at a Nevada brothel, the Associated Press reported.
Alvina Alston, publicist for JaNean Mercer, Odom's maternal aunt and godmother, said that Odom spoke a greeting and gave a thumps up Friday morning, his first communication since being hospitalized.
Odom no longer has a breathing tube, according to ESPN and is wearing a breathing mask instead.
Odom's condition had improved slightly over the past 36 hours as doctors work to make sure his organs functioned properly. His heart, kidneys and lungs were failing at one point.
Lamar Odom's spiral leaves ex-NBA star fighting for his life Tribune wire reports Lamar Odom didn't last long at the glittering intersection of championship success and Hollywood celebrity.
Cut loose by his beloved Los Angeles Lakers, followed everywhere by reality television crews, the humble kid from Queens who married into the Kardashian clan saw his life spiral out of control,...
